department: Public Works and Government Services  (PSPC) Department
short_summary: A underwater GPS system needed for the region of Mont-Joli.
description: Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, requires a navigation, communication and monitoring system for scientific diving. More specifically, an underwater GPS (UGPS) positioning system that will support scientific activities in the Mont-Joli region
